Unsure what the problem might be without seeing the exceptions.

Most of the project committers over the years have used Eclipse, so for 
development purposes that's more likely to offer a painless experience 
working straight from source/SVN. Still, any changes required for 
NetBeans should be minor.

To actually build distribution packages, exactly like those from the 
build box or official releases, a older version of Maven is used for H1. 
More details are in the H1 developer manual:

http://crawler.archive.org/articles/developer_manual/building.html#N10050

- Gordon @ IA

On 12/2/10 10:21 PM, Mohammad Amin Golshani wrote:
>
>
